pages.title: Vault Trove
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Troves$() are special Vaults, which only have a singular room containing a plentiful amount of Gilded Chests.$(br2)In addition to that, Troves are limited to only 10 minutes of Vault Time and cannot be increased via Time Fruit.

pages.title: Vault Stone
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Vault Troves$() are the only Vault Type where you can reliably obtain a grand amount of $(#033dfc)Vault Stone$(), which can be used for decoration or for crafting a $(#033dfc)Vault Charm Inscription Table$().
